name: Another Day (Quentin Kerguélen)
description:
2087, Global warming has become uncontrollable plunging the world in a restless serie of catastrophes. The poorest have been abandoned to their fate, packed like animals in the cold, while the wealthiest have find warmth and safety inside the cities wall.

You are a secretary at the border of such a city, Your job is to take letters, passports and packages and give them to the right people. (A simple click and drag), sounds easy right ? After all, this should be just another day…

/// MULTIPLE ENDINGS : don’t hesitate to play it a a few times !

Made for the Ludum Dare 42 : (Running out of Space)

  • Sounds, music and story : Hugo Beyer
  • Art : Guillaume Hirschler
  • Code : Quentin Kerguélen
